data.title: Products and Services
data.meta_description: At Hardlevel we guarantee the sustainability of the environment with focus on delivery and commitment to providing the best Products and Services within the Used Oils market.
data.text:
COMPLIANCE WITH LEGAL REQUIREMENTS

Certified operator for Used Cooking Oils Collection, Transport and Valorization (LER 20 01 25).

SERVICE QUALITY

Skilled Staff on the handling and transport of used cooking oils with specific training courses.

EFFICIENCY

Hardlevel offers their partners a service of excellence in the whole national territory, including Madeira and Azores.

48 Hour Response.

HOUSEHOLD COLLECTION OF USED COOKING OIL

In 2017 the National Oil Network was born â RENOÂ®. The infrastructure was fundamental to the success of the network â which currently has more than 2,000 Smart S+ UCO Containers installed in more than 100 municipalities in mainland Portugal.

This equipment is installed on the streets of the various municipalities, in commercial retail surfaces, gas stations, among several other locations.

The Smart S+ UCO Containers designed by Hardlevel are equipped with IoT â Internet of Things technology; on the one hand, a sensor system that allows you to know the filling status of the equipment in real time, on the other hand, interacting through an App (RENOÂ®) with the citizen, thus allowing him to count his deposits of Used Cooking Oil and qualify for prizes during the campaigns and sweepstakes that are carried out in partnership between Hardlevel and its partners.

This is the future, known as PAYT â Pay as you Throw â that is, pay effectively for the waste you produce. Join us on this mission to achieve Carbon Neutrality!
